name: Suicide Sanctum
description:
Suicide Sanctum is a 3D platformer puzzle game. You will have to sacrifice yourself to the game to make it possible to finish. You will, in fact, jump on your own dead bodies.
You will die by Arrows, Spikes and lava.
Movement:
Left: A
Right: D
Jump: Space
Restar level: R
Menu/Level select: ESC

Credit:
Code / Director: Albin Haglund @Hagge
Art: Hannes Karlqvist @Dhialga
        Theo Fredsberg @TheoQ
Music: Emil Rosenkvist @Embro0404
